column4: Hi! I'm trying to install Breezy Preview on a Raid1 System (2x4,6GB@Adaptec Controller) but after copying and configuring the packages I get an error "Installation failed" the status bar is at 75% saying "Creating device files". Any ideas? Thanks!
did you make sure that the disc isnt bad?
software raid, bob
debian installation worked before...
I am talking about the cd
sorry
Oh, sorry, should be ok, as it starts copying?!?
that has been a problem for many people and is/was a heated debate in the mailing list
so make sure that you check the burnt disc before you install
what is the best way to check?
just use a competent cd burner
k3b I think checks automagically
not sure
lol, ok
hold on let me see
yeah k3b has an option to check written data
pretty sure that will suffice
if not I think the installer has a checker
Ok, poningru, will try again with a new install cd. Thanks for your help!
np
